TEXT: "Momoi, Midori, Aris..." NL In Game Development Club, the cabinet started clattering for a while, and it's unclear why. NL #g"Momoi, Did you hear anything?" NL #r"A loss is a loss, you can't use that as an excuse to cheat!" NL #b"Aris wants play again!" NL ... NL "Don't leave me..." NL NL The cabinet unfolded with the darkness inside, twisting into the shape of a spire. NL NL "However, havenâ€™t you always been @(alone)@?"
